'''Stadukhin''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the {{Quest|The Surging Darkness}}.

==Profile==
Stadukhin is a [[Fatui]] soldier who's a part of [[Capitano]]'s forces. During the war in {{Quest|The Rainbow Destined to Burn}}, as per Capitano's order, he was temporarily placed under the Pyro Archon's command.

Although unconfirmed, he possibly dies during ''The Surging Darkness'' if "Key Supply Rescue" is not chosen in Diverging Point #2 during the quest.

===Appearance===
Stadukhin takes the appearance of a [[Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard]].

==Trivia==
* {{Lang|{{w|Mikhail Stadukhin}}|ru=Михаил Стадухин|ru_rm={{#invoke:ru-rm|main|Михаил Стадухин}}}}, was a Russian explorer of far northeast Siberia, one of the first to reach the Kolyma, Anadyr, Penzhina and Gizhiga Rivers and the northern Sea of Okhotsk.
